document.discussion_title: Running on Fumes #4, “Running on Fumes in My Work”
document.topic_text: Get this podcast on your phone! Search " chccsa " in App to add this podcast Running on Fumes #4, “Running on Fumes in My Work” Posted by chccsa on April 24th, 2016 Sometimes in life we wait until we are running on fumes before we panic and try to fix a problem. Rather than addressing problems early, we allow the gas in the tank to run dry before we act on it. Today, we see what that looks like in the workplace. Preached on April 24, 2016 by Ronnie Morgan 00:00 00:00 This entry was posted on Sunday, April 24th, 2016 at 11:15 am and is filed under Uncategorized . You can follow any responses to this entry through the RSS 2.0 feed. Both comments and pings are currently closed.
